page.title: 08Our Homes
page.content: Our homes fall into four different types,semi-detached,terraced,detatched ,houses and flats.Most houses are built of clay brickstiled roofs but some are built with stone blocks using material from outside Trowbridge and some have slate roofs. Most houses have a garden where,depending on size,people grow vegetables,flowers,shrubs and fruit trees.All houses have electricity and have gas.Life is made easier by a variety of electrical appliances such as cookers ,vacuum cleaners washing machines,tumble dryers,mixers,toasters,sandwhich makers,coffee makers and electric kettle.Television and radio provide information and entertainment.Many people have stereo music players and video recorders too.
